doc.title: Blood Money
doc.plot: The story of two African students and childhood friends,during the 60's Jonas and Pierre Marie's dreams of seeing their country finally gain its independence has become a reality. 20 years later,their outlook on things have changed which makes them part ways from each-other. Jonas has become a ruthless business man Pierre Marie and his daughter Isia, on the other hand has stayed true to the same political beliefs that once freed his country,becoming an inconvenient obstacle in Jonas's path to ambition.
